<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Eternal Elixir](/Feats.aspx?ID=5797) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=812" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 69 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Extend Elixir](/Feats.aspx?ID=5791)

</column>

---

Your body readily accepts and retains minor changes. When you drink one of your alchemical items that has the [elixir](/Traits.aspx?ID=589) and [infused](/Traits.aspx?ID=797) traits and a duration of 1 minute or more, you can make the elixir's duration indefinite. You can do so only if the elixir's level is half your level or lower. If you later consume a different elixir and make it indefinite, the effect of the previous indefinite elixir ends.
name: Eternal Elixir
